column4: hey ppl... Just a query how do u think ubuntu will run on a 1.2ghz processor...fine?
cool how will it run on a 166mhz with 128mb ram?
so will it run better than 98 or is 98 more suited to a bloody solow machinre
You may find a lighter-weight distro will perform as well/better than 98.  I recommend Xubuntu.
